articles.content: The health protocols that have been imposed to curb the spread of COVID-19 will remain in place for a long time, and safety norms such as wearing of masks will have to be followed even after a vaccin… [+1966 chars]

articles.title: 25 million couples in India couldn’t access contraceptives due to COVID-19; read more - OrissaPOST
articles.description: Geneva: The COVID-19 pandemic interrupted contraceptive access for an estimated over 25 million couples in India, said a report by the Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS (UNAIDS). Health officials in some low- and middle-income countries are bracing f…
